Description: Previous COVID 19 infection substantially reduces the risk of a new infection for up to 10 months afterwards, according to a study of care home residents and staff by University College London (UCL) scientists
Title: Prior COVID 19 infection reduces infection risk for 10 months study Reuters
Author: Alistair Smout

Description: Harvard University won the dismissal on Monday of a lawsuit by students over its decision not to partially refund tuition when it moved classes online early in the coronavirus pandemic
Title: Harvard defeats students' lawsuit over lack of COVID 19 tuition refunds Reuters
Author: Jonathan Stempel

Description: British researchers have identified the level of antibody protection needed to prevent symptomatic COVID 19, the University of Oxford said on Thursday, adding that results from the study could help speed up new vaccine development
Title: UK scientists identify antibody levels needed to prevent symptomatic COVID 19 Reuters
Author: Reuters

Description: A single dose of Russia's Sputnik V or the Oxford University AstraZeneca (AZN L) vaccine reduces mortality from COVID 19 by between 70 and 80 in people aged 60 plus, real world data from Argentina's national inoculation program show
Title: Argentina says AZ, Sputnik V single dose cuts mortality up to 80 Reuters
Author: Agustin Geist

Description: For Chinese brain researcher Song Chen, a visiting scholar at Stanford University when she was arrested last July on a visa fraud charge, a court hearing last month in San Francisco brought some hope
Title: Chinese scientists ensnared in U S visa fraud legal battle Reuters
Author: Jane Lee
